virtual void Server::Start (  const InetSocketAddr &  localAddr,
DataConnProfileId  dataConnProfileId = c_invalid_data_conn_profile_id
)  [pure virtual]
 

Public service interface. The implementation has to send messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.

Parameters:
localAddr Socket address to bind to.
dataConnProfileId ID of the DataConn to use for opening sockets.

Implemented in FtpServer, and HttpServer.

virtual void Server::Stop (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Public service interface. The implementation has to send messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.

Implemented in FtpServer, and HttpServer.
